pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() An enhanced version of Magic Missile that deals more damage and pierces armor.$(br)$(l)Magical School:$() $(c)Fury$()$(br)$(l)Mana Cost:$() 3$(br)$(l)Cooldown:$() 0.8 seconds$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/opaline_scepter)Opaline Scepter$(), $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/iridescent_scepter)Iridescent Scepter$(), $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/lustrous_scepter)Lustrous Scepter$()$(br)$(l)Tier:$() 1
